rooms.name: Entrance Hallway and Living Room
rooms.description: A spacious entrance that doubles as a living area with an open-plan layout, featuring modern furniture and large windows to ensure natural light. Vastu-aligned positioning ensures the main door faces East.
rooms.vastu_notes: Main door should face north or east for positive energy.

rooms.name: Kitchen and Dining Area
rooms.description: A contemporary kitchen with state-of-the-art appliances, designed with ample counter space and an adjoining dining area. Features efficient workflow layout.
rooms.vastu_notes: Kitchen placement is critical; ideally located in the southeast to promote health.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom 1
rooms.description: A spacious master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom. The room has a private balcony overlooking the garden.
rooms.vastu_notes: Bed should face south-west for restful sleep; avoid placing heavy objects behind the head.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom 2
rooms.description: A well-appointed secondary bedroom with a balcony. Designed to be a tranquil retreat.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A guest bedroom with built-in storage, designed to be adaptable for various uses.
rooms.vastu_notes: Avoid placing the bed directly opposite the door; ideally use north or east positioning.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: A dedicated home theater area with acoustically optimized design. Equipped with comfortable seating, ambient lighting and soundproofing.
rooms.vastu_notes: Theater should ideally be located in the west to avoid distractions.

rooms.name: Service Areas
rooms.description: Includes utility rooms, laundry and storage spaces. Essential for efficient home management.
rooms.vastu_notes: Position service areas away from main living spaces.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: A modern glass door with a foyer leading to the hallway. Vastu-aligned for inviting positive energy.

openings.name: Window in Living Room
openings.description: Large windows allowing natural light and ventilation. Aligns with Vastu principles for prosperity.

openings.name: Balcony Windows
openings.location: Adjacent to each bedroom's exterior wall
openings.description: Spacious balconies providing outdoor access, fresh air, and scenic views. Each designed according to Vastu for enhanced privacy.

openings.name: Rooftop Terrace Access
openings.location: Central corridor leading upstairs or via an external staircase
openings.description: Provides access to the rooftop terrace, offering panoramic views and recreational space.

vastu_overview.entrance_alignment: Main door faces east to invite positive energy.
vastu_overview.room_orientation: Bedrooms in master units ideally face south-west for calmness; guest bedroom can face north or east.
vastu_overview.utility_placement: Service areas and kitchens located away from main living spaces, with kitchen preferably in southeast.
